resources.string: This application helps you to detect COVID-19 early.
Choose one what do you need
Press the mic button to test COVID-19
1. First, if you feel your cough is different than usual, this app suits you.
2. Second, click the “Detect Cough” button on the main page. Then it will be redirected to the detection page.
3. Third, press the mic button and start recording your cough. Wait a while until the results come out

Sorry, you are Identified
as suspected of being infected virus COVID-19. Don\'t panic! immediately check to the nearest hospital and isolate at home. Always wear a mask, keep your distance and wash your hands regularly.
Hope you get well soon!

You are Not Identified
as being infected by the virus COVID-19. Continue to apply health protocols to break the chain of COVID-19.
Keep Healthy!
